name: Beat Rocket!
description:
Fast-paced, rhythm-centered bullet hell game where you are trying to avoid bullets and evaporate your enemies with a powerful laser that can immediately decimate enemies, but there's a catch! You only fire on a beat and so are your enemies!

The entire game was made with blood and tears in about a week.

I don't regret anything, in fact, i will do it again.

There are some things  i wanted to add including, but not limited to:

1. Custom maps

2. osu! beatmap converter

3. Level Editor

But yeah, you can guess what happened. (You can actually create a custom map, parser is there, there's just nothing interesting to parse because i scrapped most of it,  level editor is there too, but i didn't get far).

Controls:

Cursor position = movement/laser direction

Space = Boost

game sucks, i know.
